TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ReplicaSelector extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This is a helper class for selecting replicas.
Docs.remarks: It allows the user to select replicas to be targeted by the testability APIs. The selection can be a particular replica of a partition based on the ReplicaId or Role or a random replica of the partition.
